I met with @MomsDemand Kansas Chapter this week.
 
We grieved. We comforted each other. And we talked about what we can do to protect our children from gun violence. https://t.co/gCLrjVpRnm

I rode along the Johnson County Railroad last week to hear how businesses in our area are dealing with delays, and how we can help get things moving again.
